greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: E.g.f.: exp(1 + x + x^2/2! - exp(x)).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..592
formula: a(0) = 1; a(n) = -Sum_{k=3..n} binomial(n-1,k-1) * a(n-k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 20 2020
maple: seq(factorial(n) * coeftayl(exp(1+x+x^2/2!-exp(x)), x = 0, n),n = 0..50); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Oct 05 2017
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Sep 28 2017
